homeAboutSubtitleText1: The Music label under Believe Music Distribution, one of the world's largest music distribution companies
homeAboutSubtitleText2: ​The label carries out label construction around the three central concepts of "building a musical social community", "discovering and cultivating new musicians" and "pursuing artistic emotional expression"
homeAboutContent1: Through interaction on mainstream platforms, online and offline performances and exhibitions, creative sharing sessions and other forms, we provide a platform for musicians and art workers to learn and communicate. We not only sign contracts to release music, but also build a community around music and art to promote cooperation and inspiration within the community. By developing Tales of Echo's unique music video program and cooperating with visual and video artists, we extend music into the multimedia field, create a richer music experience, and build a social community that loves music.
homeAboutContent2: At Tales of Echo, every musician is a unique shining star on our music stage. Not only are musicians welcome to take the initiative to choose Tales of Echo as a stage for their development, but we also encourage creators recognized by our team to join us. Even if the production skills have not yet reached the mature stage, Tales of Echo's jury and production team will provide personalized guidance and are committed to helping each musician realize their dreams. We believe that any creator with ideals and passion for music can gain valuable music production learning experience in our label.
homeAboutContent3: In a commercial and quantity-oriented music environment, Tales of Echo pursues not only pure music production, but also the deep emotions behind each track. We see music as a medium of emotional expression, a language through which we communicate with the world. We strive to create music that touches the soul, so that every song conveys our deepest emotions. Here, art does not stop at the technical level, but also resonates with the soul again and again, and is an affectionate expression of the world. We pursue music and art that can touch people's hearts and leave a deep mark. We firmly believe that the true charm of music lies in its power to touch people's hearts.
homeHighlightContent1: Whether you are in need of personalized music production or a creator eager to create your own music world, the Tales of Echo production team will provide you with a full range of customized services.In this project, we will gain a deep understanding of your musical vision and work with you to curate and hone a unique piece of music. While providing a full range of music production, Tales of Echo is also good at specific production services such as audio processing. We can provide you with a full range of customized solutions.
homeHighlightContent2: Around the purpose of building a musical social community​, excavationThe infinite possibilities of music, Tales of Echo launches a new music video project! This project will present a perfect fusion of art, music and vision, bringing you an unprecedented audio-visual feast. We will invite our outstanding musicians to work with Tales of Echo's multimedia production team to outline fascinating music pictures through creative music videos. This is not only a visual expression of music, but also a presentation of the deep emotions of each song, bringing you a full-body musical journey.
homeHighlightContent3: To explore the charm of music, we welcome music creators from all over the world to join us! Provide a unique and rich music stage for you who dream of playing musical notes. Through our rigorous review and personalized cooperation, your music dreams will shine brightly here. We also encourage new producers with music dreams to join, let Tales of Echo be your guide on the music journey, and jointly write the future chapter of music. Whether you are a passionate newbie or an experienced producer, we are eagerly waiting for you to join us and create the miracle of music together.
heroTextContent1: Created with attitude, performed with creativity, and painted with stories...
heroTextContent2: Originated from the love for music and persistence in creation. This attitude is not only reflected in the music itself, but also serves as a bridge between Tales of Echo and its listeners. Write the story of music, build music resonance and emotional resonance with the audience, and make the music more meaningful and deep. In this music stage, we are not satisfied with the ordinary, but pursue excellence and challenge the constraints of tradition. Join us and let music no longer be a lonely melody, but the beauty of art we create together.
creatorsSubtitleText: In the Tales of Echo Worldwide team, we witness the outstanding achievements of the younger generation of the millennium. This team brings together outstanding professionals from various fields. Whether in the fields of music, art, media or business, their shared enthusiasm and progressive mentality have shaped the unique atmosphere of this collective and become a powerful driving force to realize their dreams.
aboutIntroSubtitle1: Tales of Echo Records, also known as Tales of Echo Worldwide, is a music label established in 2024 by 5k·Demons and Subverter.
aboutIntroSubtitle2: Tales of Echo is dedicated to building a music ecosystem, developing and cultivating new musicians, and pursuing artistic emotional expression. It is a creative field with both depth and breadth created by integrating the artistic expression of music, art, and video media.
musicReleaseItemContent1: Tales of Echo Records has partnered with Believe Distribution, one of the world's largest music distribution companies, to provide musicians with more professional distribution services, directly connecting to 200+ music platforms globally, covering 230+ countries and regions.
musicReleaseItemContent2: Tales of Echo maintains close cooperative relationships with domestic and foreign platforms, providing the label and artists with optimal distribution conditions and the highest quality of service. Priority channels for various marketing and promotion plans bring you more exposure opportunities and official platform recommendations.
musicReleaseItemContent3: Students from well-known domestic and foreign media and art colleges and members with rich public relations experience form the powerful publicity team of Tales of Echo. Our publicity includes but is not limited to cover production, copywriting, music video production, and other online and offline dissemination.
musicReleaseItemContent4: The review team members of Tales of Echo include students from well-known domestic and foreign music colleges and senior music critics. We analyze songs from the perspective of music art and production to ensure that all submissions receive professional and comprehensive feedback.
musicReleaseItemContent5: Tales of Echo pays attention to and respects different music cultures and creative styles, and is committed to promoting diversity and innovation in music. The music types we include are not limited to mainstream styles such as pop, rock, electronic, rap, and pure music, as well as experimental and underground styles.
musicReleaseItemContent6: While partnering with Believe Distribution, one of the world's largest distribution companies, Tales of Echo has also cooperated with many performing arts companies, media companies, and music performance venues. It has a complete and independent music industry ecological structure, including four major sectors: music production, music records, music brokerage, and music performance, providing artists with professional multi-faceted services.
releaseEinzigDesc: Derived from life and personal feelings, it integrates electronic and electronic core elements. The main song is warm in color, shaping hazy memory fragments. The two choruses are in different styles, which is a catharsis of life and a memory of experience.
releaseOurJourneyDesc1: This is a retracing of sound, a reunion of emotions. Tales of Echo's first label compilation "Our Journey" is not just an album, it carries the bit by bit memories and creative journey we have walked with our musician friends. Every note witnesses the dreams and persistence of the past, and every song records the time we crossed together.
releaseOurJourneyDesc2: This album integrates the inspirations of musicians who grew up with the label. They are friends and family, and the most important fellow travelers on our music road. "Our Journey" is not only a review of the past, but also a prospect for the future. The fusion and collision of multiple elements such as electronic, pop, rock, and experimental music weave our own lingering sound story!
releaseLNTDesc1: Share the blues moment of the full moon night
releaseLNTDesc2: I have fantasized countless times about becoming each other's reliance in the future on a full moon night. Enjoy the romantic and comfortable tipsiness together on the full moon night, just be a momentary lover tonight.
releaseLNTDesc3: Late Night Tequila has gone through a year of precipitation and polishing by Rino, and finally completed the recording and arrangement. People often say that love is perfect under the moonlight, and Rino has entrusted all the love in his heart to the melody and notes of the full moon. Just as the lyrics express, happiness on the night of the full moon is at our fingertips. Press the play button and enjoy your blues moment together!
submissionIntro: At Tales of Echo, we sincerely invite artists and bands full of attitude and passion to join our family. No matter which music style you are a producer of, we open our doors to welcome you. We know that the production level of newcomers varies, but if you have a sincere attitude and passion for music like us, we will be happy to help you. We are eager to witness and create refreshing music works together.
submissionJoinSubtitle: Artists who meet the conditions will be granted the following privileges
submissionFeature3: Join T.E. review and production team
submissionFeature5: More cooperation opportunities inside and outside the label
submissionType3Desc: (Lyrics, composition, arrangement, recording, mixing, mastering, etc.)
submissionFormSubtitle: You can upload your demo submission by filling in the information below, or contact our label's official WeChat (talesofecho2024) or email (welcome@talesofecho.net), and provide MP3 format audio or recording and video files with a high degree of completion to demonstrate your personal music level, creative intent (briefly describe the creative idea of the work) and contact information. Our A&R will communicate with you about related matters as soon as possible.
submissionFooterText: Thank you for your support of Tales of Echo. The review results will be sent to your email or WeChat within 48 hours.
aboutArtistsIntro: Tales of Echo is honored to have an excellent and diverse team of artists who come from different countries, different age groups, have different production styles and understanding of music. Whether they are music majors who study music theory in depth, or amateurs who pursue their music dreams, they have contributed unique and precious talents and enthusiastic attitudes towards music art to the creation of Tales of Echo. This team that spans national borders, cultures, time and space makes Tales of Echo's music works full of layers and depth.
